TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualizingPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel
Public MustInherit Class VirtualizingPanel Inherits Panel
public ref class VirtualizingPanel abstract : System::Windows::Controls::Panel

summary.span: 为虚拟化其子数据集合的 元素提供一个框架。

span.span: Provides a framework for elements that virtualize their child data collection.

summary.span: 这是一个抽象类。

span.span: This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此上下文中，"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成从更大的多个数据项基于哪些项目是屏幕上可见。In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen. 它是在内存和处理器，以生成大量的密集型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]时在给定时间只是一些可能在屏幕上的元素。It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time. 继承自一个面板，如、 计算可见的项，并处理从(如或) 仅创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]为可见项的元素.A panel that inherits from , such as the , calculates visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to only create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements for visible items. 以下列表描述了事例时无法虚拟化项容器：The following lists describes cases when the cannot virtualize item containers: - 包含不同类型的项容器。The contains item containers of different types. 例如，可能拥有同时使用这两项和用作项容器的对象。For example, a might have items that use both and objects as the item containers. - 显式创建到项容器。You explicitly create the item containers to the . 有关显式与隐式创建项容器的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about explicitly versus implicitly creating item containers, see the class. 当是虚拟化项容器，你可能需要保存与容器，而不是与数据项自身相关联的状态信息。When a is virtualizing item containers, you may need to save state information that is associated with a container instead of with the data item itself. 例如，如果项包含通过控件，于项容器中，而不适用于数据项自身绑定状态。For example, if an item is contained by an control, the state is bound to the item container, and not to the data item itself. 当重用的新项目的当前值新项的使用。When the is reused for a new item, the current value of is used for the new item. 此外，旧项目不保留其值。In addition, the old item does not retain its value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用派生类[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example demonstrates how to use the derived class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[virtualizingstackpanel_intro#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存是视区（其中的项未虚拟化）上方或下方的空间量。The cache is the amount of space above or below the viewport in which items are not virtualized. 使用缓存来避免生成[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素如它们要滚动到视图。Use a cache to avoid generating [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements as they’re scrolled into view. 属性确定使用的度量单位。The property determines the unit of measurement that is used by .
